This application connects to our devices with Bluetooth to send and read data. We will never track your location. But applications with access to your device Bluetooth, can track your location even if are running in background. For that reasons we request Bluetooth and location permissions.
Toggle the switch to turn the LED 3 on or off.
Press Button 1 on the dev kit.

From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices. This is because Bluetooth LE beacons, for example iBeacons or Eddystone, may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location. nRF Blinky will not use this information in any way.
The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable it.
